home.subtitle: Learn Languages with Native Speakers
home.description: Connect with tutors who speak the language you want to learn and start improving your skills today.

features.learn_description: Take lessons when it suits you and focus on the topics that interest you most.
features.connect_description: Practice with tutors who speak the language naturally and understand its cultural context.
features.grow_description: Track your progress, set goals, and continuously improve your language abilities.
